title: 'The Nightly Show With Larry Wilmore' Debuts In Slot Vacated By Stephen Colbert
teaser: On Monday night, Comedy Central premiered former Daily Show correspondent Larry Wilmore's new show. While Wilmore's sarcastic comments on clips were funny, the round-table discussion didn't sparkle.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
